Summary 
Just relocated to Singapore to pursue an opportunity in the rapidly growing mobile apps environment.  
 
Before, Senior Account Manager in the Tech/Branding industry, I joined Google in the Global Business Organization, where I grew my Sales & Consulting expertise, helping Tech&Telco customers to thrive with their online marketing campaigns. I achieved strong results with my customers portfolio and with multiple extra-core projects, all of which led to a new role in Q4 2014.  
 
Prior to Google I had international Marketing and Sales experience in a major FMCG Company - Colgate-Palmolive, where I held multiple positions, as Brand Manager / Key Customer Manager, and an assignment in Global Customer Development. Summary

Summary 19+ years of solid experience in industry working on products for large enterprises. This includes 13+ years in big companies like Microsoft, Siemens and Diebold and 6+ years in startups like Stratify, Talisma and Kony.  
 
I have a deep passion for technology and a strong entrepreneurial spirit. I have worked in different verticals like telecom, eCRM, unstructured data management, virtualization, cloud computing and a large internet service. Last many years I have working on cloud particularly MS Azure and AWS. I am familiar with Hadoop, HDFS, Hive, HBase technologies. Also familiar with Chef scripts in AWS.  
On development front, I am familiar with MS stack (.Net, WCF, WPF, WWF), Open source (PHP, MySQL) and J2EE. I am at ease with scripting languages like perl, powershell and python. Also quite comfortable with RDBMS like SQL Server and Oracle.  
 
I have managed small to big teams (including a set of managers and leads at different levels) and take the pride in being still hands on in many areas. Have got numerous accolades and awards in Technical Excellence, Innovation and Management (people management and giving strategic insight).
